MinIO.description:
MinIO is an S3-compatible object storage server.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/minio/minio, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
MinIO.more_info: This Rock-on uses the official MinIO Docker image to implement a single MinIO instance with a single object storage share, suitable for use on a private network.  If your connections traverse a network you do not control, consider using a VPN for encryption.  IMPORTANT: Read and understand the MinIO Rock-on documentation concerning port selection before installing this Rock-on.

9001.description: Port for Admin Portal access, default 9001
9001.label: MinIO Admin Portal Port

/data.description: Choose a share for MinIO object storage
/data.label: MinIO Object Storage

MINIO_CONSOLE_ADDRESS.description: MinIO Console Address, for example, ":9001".  Must be the same port as "MinIO Admin Portal Port".
MINIO_CONSOLE_ADDRESS.label: MinIO Console Address

MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD.description: MinIO Administrator Password, 8 to 128 alphanumeric characters
MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD.label: MinIO Admin Password

MINIO_ROOT_USER.description: MinIO Administrator Username, 3 to 128 alphanumeric characters
MINIO_ROOT_USER.label: MinIO Admin User
